events.name: Catskill Mountain Maker Camp
events.description: A five-day gathering of makers, artisans, and educators featuring hands-on workshops in woodworking, metalworking, textiles, and creative technologies. Families can participate in demos, learn new skills, and explore the maker culture in a festival-like atmosphere.
events.short_description: Hands-on maker festival with workshops and demos for all ages.

events.name: Hunter Mountain Oktoberfest
events.description: A Bavarian-style fall festival featuring German food, beer, and live music with polka bands. Scenic chairlift rides showcase peak Catskills foliage. Includes craft vendors and family-friendly entertainment.
events.short_description: Free-admission Oktoberfest with music, food, beer, and fall fun.

events.name: Belleayre Mountain Fall Festival
events.description: An outdoor fall celebration with dozens of food and craft vendors, live music, free children’s activities (pumpkin decorating, games, bounce house), Smokey Bear appearances, and scenic gondola rides to view autumn foliage.
events.short_description: Free family fall festival with crafts, music, kids’ games, and gondola rides.

events.name: Maple Shade Hootenanny
events.description: A two-day farm festival showcasing the Catskills’ farm-to-table bounty with food, craft beer, cider, and wine. Features family activities, games, live music, and interactive farm workshops.
events.short_description: Harvest festival with local food, drinks, farm activities, and music.

events.name: Callicoon Art Walk
events.description: An arts festival turning Callicoon’s streets and shops into open galleries. Features visual art, live performances, interactive workshops, and music. Dozens of artists participate with family-friendly activities.
events.short_description: One-day arts festival with exhibitions, performances, and workshops.

events.name: Peace, Love & Pumpkins
events.location_name: Bethel Woods Center for the Arts
events.description: A walk-through Halloween trail featuring thousands of hand-carved pumpkins, themed pumpkin art installations, and illuminated garden paths. Includes family-friendly night markets and special weekend drone shows.
events.short_description: Pumpkin light trail with themed displays and festive atmosphere.

events.name: Catskills Lark in the Park
events.description: A regional outdoor festival celebrating the Catskill Park with guided hikes, paddling trips, cycling tours, and educational nature programs. Activities are spread across the park and suitable for all ages.
events.short_description: Guided hikes and outdoor adventures across the Catskill Park.
